function_signatures.CUDA: long long array_sum(const Array& arr); // Calculate the sum of a large array
function_signatures.other: long long array_sum(const Array& arr); // Calculate the sum of a large array

function_signatures.CUDA: void matrix_multiply(const Matrix& A, int N, int M, Matrix& result); // N is the number of rows and M is the number of columns. Calculate the multiplication of matrix A and its transpose
function_signatures.other: void matrix_multiply(const Matrix& A, Matrix& result); // Calculate the multiplication of matrix A and its transpose

contexts.CUDA:
// CUDA is suitable for using one-dimensional arrays
using Matrix = std::vector<int>;
contexts.other:
// General two-dimensional vector matrix representation
using Matrix = std::vector<std::vector<int>>;

function_signatures.CUDA: void bfs(const CUDAGraph& graph, int start, std::vector<int> & result); // start is the starting node. Save the results in BFS order to the result and print the final size of the result to the terminal
function_signatures.other: void bfs(const Graph& graph, int start, std::vector<int> & result); // start is the starting node. Save the results in BFS order to the result and print the final size to the terminal
